I had to minimise the video and listen to it. The animation that went with the podcast was distracting and poorly drawn. It looks like a home-made kids cartoon on those really bad "community" TV stations. Waste of bandwidth. Download the podcasts instead and save yourselves 170 meg. Ricky is still cool, but this sucks.
Dont waste your time with this show unless you have a mental age of about 7
lol i got baked and watched this five times in a row...  great show, naysayers, smoke a joint and quit taking yourself so seriously! cheers!

Well, the show is a-ok, not Ricky Gervais' best work. It's like when me and my friends get together and just rant about stuff and talk silly.. I had hoperd for something a bit mor brilliant from Gervais by now.

But it's not bad, the people hating it must be religious or something because in this first episode he talks about evolution and Darwinism and also he laughed at the guy who thought man and dinosours lived together. I think some religious people will get angry because they believe this. They're fuckin' retards!
